name: Cantaloupe
description: Premium® Cantaloupe brings a refreshing tropical sweetness with a mellow, juicy aroma that perfectly complements your favorite beverages. A true taste of summer in every sip.
ingredients: Granulated Sugar, Water, Synthetic Cantaloupe Flavoring, Acidity Regulator Citric Acid, Preservative Potassium Sorbate, Salt

name: Green Apple
description: Premium® Green Apple offers a crisp and tangy flavor, enhanced by its refreshing aroma and vibrant green hue. Perfect for adding a zesty twist to any drink creation.
ingredients: Granulated Sugar, Water, Acidity Regulator Citric Acid, Synthetic Apple Flavoring, Preservative Potassium Sorbate, Salt, Synthetic Colorings (Tartrazine CI 19140, Brilliant Blue CI 42090), Artificial Sweetener (Sucralose)

name: Mango
description: Premium® Mango brings a burst of tropical sweetness, enriched with juicy and vibrant mango notes. Perfect for adding a sunny touch to your refreshing creations.
